thread.title: 'Selling honey in my front garden will add £4,000 to my insurance'
thread.title_full: 'Selling honey in my front garden will add £4,000 to my insurance'

author: Kate Palmer
title: 'Selling honey in my front garden will add £4,000 to my insurance'
text: Buildings and Content 'Selling honey in my front garden will add £4,000 to my insurance' One phone call to their home insurer meant these hobby beekeepers were told to reinsure as a business – at double the cost Anne and Bruce Nelson were stung by a £4,000 increase to their home insurance when they were deemed to 'run a business' by selling pots of honey Photo: Lorne Campbell
